Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored a brace to secure victory for Croatia
Dominik Livakovic denied Nicola Zalewski with a crucial save
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia's manager did not provide specific reflections but noted the importance of the win
Poland's coach expressed disappointment with the performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Modric turned 39 on the day of the match
Strikers Igor Matanovic and Robert Lewandowski hit the bar for Croatia and Poland respectively
